dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I was just reading this, uh, fascinating piece about Jeff Bezos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I was just reading this, uh, fascinating piece about Jeff Bezos.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's he up to now? More billions? [chuckles]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's he up to now? More billions?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he's been selling, like, a *ton* of Amazon stock. Seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he's been selling, like, a ton of Amazon stock. Seriously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sales on August 1 and 2 followed $1.4 billion (after-tax) worth of Amazon stock he sold in the final three days of July.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A ton? I mean, he's already the richest guy on Earth, right? Still worth, what, $110 billion?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A ton? I mean, he's already the richest guy on Earth, right? Still worth, what, one hundred ten billion dollars?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the richest man on earth, Bezos is now worth an estimated $110.1 billion, using Mondays closing share price for Amazon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! But in just the last few days of July, he sold, uh, $1.4 billion worth. After tax!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! But in just the last few days of July, he sold, uh, one point four billion dollars worth. After tax!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sales on August 1 and 2 followed $1.4 billion (after-tax) worth of Amazon stock he sold in the final three days of July.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And then more this month?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And then more this month?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, on August 1st and 2nd. The article says Amazon hasn't commented on *why*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, on August first and second. The article says Amazon hasn't commented on why.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sales on August 1 and 2... A spokesman for Amazon has not commented on the purpose for Bezos last stock sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like, why does he *need* that cash? What's the, um, leading theory?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like, why does he need that cash? What's the, um, leading theory?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Everyone's saying it's for Blue Origin. You know, his space company?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Everyone's saying it's for Blue Origin. You know, his space company?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The leading theory is that it is to fund Blue Origin, a space exploration company that Bezos founded in September 2000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, Blue Origin! [interrupts] I remember him saying something about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, Blue Origin! I remember him saying something about that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he told journalists in 2017 he funds it by selling Amazon shares.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he told journalists in twenty seventeen he funds it by selling Amazon shares.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos told journalists at a space exploration conference in 2017 that he was funding Blue Origin by selling some of his Amazon shares.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, it's not a new thing, then. Just, uh, a lot of stock this time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it's not a new thing, then. Just, uh, a lot of stock this time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: *A lot*. Over 530,000 shares, according to SEC filings. When they were, like, $1,900 each.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A lot. Over five hundred thirty thousand shares, according to S E C filings. When they were, like, nineteen hundred dollars each.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to documents filed on Monday afternoon with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the worlds richest man sold over 530,000 shares of Amazon when the stock price was around $1,900 a share.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [whistles] That's, uh, some serious coin. Even if the price dropped a bit since then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, uh, some serious coin. Even if the price dropped a bit since then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, closed at $1,765 on Monday. Still, a massive amount.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, closed at seventeen sixty five dollars on Monday. Still, a massive amount.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Monday, the stock closed at $1,765 a share.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, Bezos is just, um, fueling his space dreams.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, Bezos is just, um, fueling his space dreams.
